name: wes wilkins
text: My wife and I had dinner, no wait, promptly seated; great wait staff; had the short-term Hawaiian pizza and two dinner salads ‚Äî all was good and was checked by staff adequately. Will be back!

name: lyndsey dkhili
text: Ally is a rare gem of a person. Beautiful within out. She hustled and bustled the whole time we were there. She was our waitress, she did carry out plus more. Your diligence is going to get you far in life - best wishes!

name: ziv Cohen
text: The food and drinks are great. Their pizza is exceptionally good. However the service was INCREDIBLY slow. It was Friday night and the place was rather packed, but still, 20 minutes for appetizers is not OK.

name: Todd Spradlin
text: The staff was great. Top notch. But the pizza wasn't great. It was like adding cheese and sauce over a piece of chipboard.

name: Christy May
text: Great environment.  Fast service even on a busy night (Graduation!).  Great pizza and friendly staff.  Would recommend this place to all my friends.  I had a Guinness beer and the House special pizza.  Both came out fast and delicious. Love the funky art as well . üëçüëç

name: amanda milam
text: Food was amazing, need very ate here until now and was glad I did. Would like to go back and try there pizza and there pretzel bites. Waiter was great.

name: Sheryl Lockhart
text: My host Mark was amazing, the food was great and the Falcon's finally won! What a great day ü§ó

name: Matthew Steede
text: Spinach dip was outstanding! Veggie and Steak and cheese calzones were great. Can't wait to try more.

name: Charles Thatcher
text: Love this Mellow Mushroom, the food is really good and the service is amazing, I haven‚Äôt been there in a while but I plan on going back soon.

name: Thomas Pierzina
text: I love the servers and hostess! They were wonderful; however, I‚Äôm very indifferent towards the manager Cj. He was very passive aggressive and extremely condescending. He was treating the customers and servers very poorly. I adore Meg and don‚Äôt know how or why this man was hired.

name: Bunny Maddy
text: First time going here but WOW, I loved the steak and cheese Calzone. Everything is so tasty and flavorful!

name: Christian Jendrasak
text: Service was good. The food was decent. But it's way overpriced for what you get. Some people like these cliche restaurants that charge a lot for atmosphere. Don't get me wrong it's a nice place. But $40 for two people to eat lunch when ‚Ä¶More

name: R Brown
text: Food and service was great. Nice location too.

name: Kris Kearney
text: Love the server great service. Very polite. Very quality on the pizza

name: eric helton
text: Loved it! The food and service was excellent!  Our server was as good as they come!

name: James Wade
text: First of all we love this place!  It is our "go to" restaurant for pizza.  We have been going there for many years.  During the covid pandemic we have not ventured out much.  When restaurants opened we could not resist going for our ‚Ä¶More

name: Andrew Hanson
text: Loved the vibe of this place. Mellow Mushrooms have all got that feeling of psychedelia pumping through em, but this one does it different. Pizza was great (perfect crust if you ask me), bathrooms were super clean, and the servers were helpful to the point of embarrassment. Such a cool and welcoming place to drop into.

name: Cierra‚Äôs Journey
text: The pizza here is really amazing & the wing sauce is delicious

name: Marie Prince
text: 1st time eating here. Really enjoyed.

name: Bruce Gilbert
text: Server was very attentive, and knowledgeable about the menu and the Speciatly Pizza.  BarBQ pizza is highly recommended.

name: Mary Hollowell
text: MM has great garlicy pizza but I'm curious as to how the psychedelicy mushroom decor arose? And I've been glad to share aerosol geoengineering awareness materials, here. Crops & ingredients will be further damaged, if we don't tackle this serious pollution problem!

name: Daniel Dameron
text: The food and service were excellent however we were overrun by Flies!!!   We had napkins covering our drinks while we constsntly swatted at the fIies!!  I called the manager over and explained what was happening.  He agreed and said he ‚Ä¶More

name: Cherri Sorrells
text: Didn‚Äôt get a chance to try this place. I went in for carry out and the hostess greeted two groups who were BEHIND me. Didn‚Äôt even speak or acknowledge me even after skipping over me twice. Poor customer service for overpriced pizza.

name: Robert Burton
text: I love this venue a lot. theres a happy spirit. The cuisine is very tasty. the service is efficient and the team is trained. The cost is reasonable. very much recommend.

name: Margaret Amend
text: I‚Äôve ordered pickup fives times now from this location and pizza it is always luke warm even though I arrive 10 mins before the time it is supposed to be ready. This last time it was basically cold. Why tell me 30 mins if you are making it much sooner?

name: C. Wells
text: During these times of Covid 19, it is such a pleasure to have a restaurant that offers good food, great service, and a safe atmosphere with a nice covered outdoor area and all employees wearing face masks,as recommended by the CDC. Many ‚Ä¶More

name: Michel Lusakueno
text:
I have never felt compelled to write a negative review about a business.
We placed a takeout order for a Calzone and a Pizza at 5:50 PM
We arrived at 6:10 PM to pick it up
Waited until 6:55 PM outside to get my food.

name: Jessica Schmid
text: Wow! Great experience at this location. Justin was our server we were all celebrating my brothers deployment and participating in trivia. Justin was on it! The food is so delicious here and the atmosphere is great. The DJ made a huge ‚Ä¶More

name: Rennie
text: The waiter made sure my party had plenty of water, and brought the food out without much of a wait. I really like the appetizers here and the atmosphere of the restaurant. It's family friendly, and quick.

name: Sheri Metternick-Jones
text: Great service on Haliween!

name: Roger Starkey
text: The food was good, service not so much.  Waited 45 minutes to get a table for three.  There were plenty of tables available if someone would have cleaned them.  Once seated finally a waitress took our order and disappeared our drinks came out the same time as our food.

name: Otis Burney
text: Too small to accommodate a Thursday night crowd. Tables too close together, wait staff overwhelmed. And then the pizza is mediocre at best but they charge premium prices for them??

name: Adam D
text: Great food.and friendly staff.

name: M. A.
text: They have the best pizza! Love the greek salad and pesto garlic bread too. Never disappointed...

name: keith butler
text: We were sat in a corner of the restaurant and kind of forgot us üòÅ but the when the waitress realized it  her and the manager came apologized and even gave us some appetizers on the house and the pizzas well its Mellow Mushroom no more said, I would like to say "thank you for a very pleasant evening meal guys" üíØüëåüëç

name: Stephen B
text: Good food and great service on a Halloween evening. The staff was friendly and inviting while the food was very good and tasty, the normal very good pizza, and it was out very quickly. We enjoyed our time here.

name: Rick Pabst
text: Always love Mellow Mushroom. Food is good and atmosphere is nice. Service can be slow when the kitchen is backed up, but we still like it.

name: Norm Dunkin
text: Excellent pizza, great selection, friendly and attentive staff, good beer selection.  My favorite pizza place. Nothing compares with it.

name: LaWanda Tallman
text: We had good service from Justin, and our pizza was delicious. My husband enjoyed the half-price beer night also. That's on Mondays.

name: A French-Williams
text: Great food and service was great to... Not disappointed... Worth the trip...

name: A doG naMed BRUTUS
text: Excellent pizza, with generous toppings, and a great  ratio of cheese  to sauce. Their crust has no equal, light crispy texture and golden  color.

name: Lauren Collins
text: Excellent service, excellent food. A tiny bit pricier than your typical take out pizza, but quality is definitely worth it, and they have a ton of options. The staff is amazing too, our server was super nice and the food came out at a reasonable time!

name: chris m
text: Better than the two by my house! Great pizza, wonderful staff, neat decor.

name: Rodney Williams
text: The pizza was good and had great service.

name: Bray Sims
text: Love the service and food. Always consistent flavor and if they don't get it right...they will try to fix it and won't see till they do. I bring my family and friends here often.

name: Aleks Derzhay
text: The quality of the service and food have been improving more and more with every visit to this location. Great for when your in the mood for high quality pizza and a nice beer menu.

name: Jeel Dharek
text: Good location with patio seating area. I personally feel Patio seating area is better than inside as it is way more spacious than the indoor settings. Food and service were above average. Would like to see more items on menu, pretty limited ‚Ä¶More

name: Christopher Camacho
text: Mellow Mushroom is an old favorite and the Peachtree City location is one of the best. ‚Ä¶More

name: Talia Bostian
text: The food was great as usual, and the restaurant looked cool.  The radio was too loud, and the waiter in charge of our section didnt seem to care.  Twice we had to get the attention of a different waiter to find out why 2 salads and a pizza ‚Ä¶More

name: One-Two-Seven Squad
text: We go to Georgia for a few reasons. Walking Dead, Georgia weather, Bojangles, and Mellow Mushroom. We come from right outside of New Haven which (arguably) has the best pizza in the world. Mellow Mushroom is hands down my FAVORITE pizza. ‚Ä¶More

name: Rashad Easton
text: One of the best pizza restaurants I've ate at. Classic flavor, classic pizza!

name: tyra carter
text: Great service and excellent food!

name: Jacob Drake
text: Love this restaurant. We love sitting outside as much as possible when the weather is nice. The kids really enjoy the pizza. The wait staff are really great. We love the cosmic karma pizza which is the best I always add sausage to it too.

name: Abi D
text:
Awesome restaurant! Very clean and bright. The staff was really friendly, helpful and welcoming.
The food was out of this world as well. This is a great place for lunch, or to have a fun dinner with your family.

name: Toni Marshall
text: Good pizza but customer service was not the best. Almost an hour to get food

name: Richard Tallant
text: Perfect dinner,.....best pizza ever.  Great on everything.  You want be disappointed.

name: Selena Paden
text: Very nice and fast

name: natalie alford
text: Great pizza! Great atmosphere and friendly staff.

name: Valerie Cheek
text: I love Melllow Mushroom,and when I went buy and saw that they had one in Peachtree City it made my day.Always great service,food,everyone  working hard and having fun doing. there  jobs. AWESOME CALAZONES ,NOT TO MENTION PIZZA.

name: Laura Bultman
text: Love the mellow!  We have eaten at this particular location many times (and carryout) and the pizza is consistently spectacular.  The chicken wings are actually very good as well, but we've never really gone down the sandwiches/burger ‚Ä¶More

name: Sha Ras
text: Waited forever for a server to acknowledge us and take our order. 2 servers working our area. Only 2 other tables in our area had customers. Totally not busy. Another family was seated long after we were and were immediately helped with their order. We finally left and went to ‚ÄúYour Pie‚Äù.

name: Lex Chao
text: Funky Q Chicken is the best

name: Gary Pfeifer
text: The restaurant is located in a great area with plenty of parking. The interior was made up great for kids. I enjoyed the food especially the Greek Salad. Delicious. Although the floor was a little sticky. We will definitely be back.

name: Bethan Mingle
text: Vegan options! The crust is dairy free.

name: MAHIKA KUMAR
text: Prices were way to expensive!  For one person, it was $19.53.  Food was great though.

name: A Waits
text: Great food and great service.  Eat at Mellow Mushroom in Peachtree City multiple times a week.  Also drag my family to Mellow in other cities when we travel.

name: Dylan Corrales
text: Mellow mushroom is a really cool pizza place. The food is delicious, the staff are friendly, and the food comes out to the table surprisingly quickly. I'll definitely be coming back here soon.

name: Jim Schaubroeck
text: Awesome pizza. Fresh ingredients. Great service!

name: Jim Jaroszewski
text: Great food with an extensive drink list as well. The kids had a blast as well as their parents. They have a Gluten-Free crust that actually tastes delicious.  I would definitely recommend to family and friends

name: Vanessa King
text: Perfection üòç‚úåÔ∏è

name: leslie stamper
text: I'm a native New  Yorker so i tend to be more critical of pizza!!  But mellow Mushrooms pizza is delicious!! The holy shiitake pie is so good!!  It has such unique flavors!! The food is a little pricey but well worth it!!

name: Austin Pennington
text: Don‚Äôt even know where to began. Service was awful over multiple visits. Food quality is poor compared to other locations. Was served cold wings and pizza with doughy crust. This location is really bad compared to the others I‚Äôve been too. ‚Ä¶More

name: abc123 *
text: Great service. Pizza has gone down hill. Very disappointing! üò¢

name: Jordan Hendricks
text: Mellow Mushroom is solid and is a Georgia institution. This location was excellent. Service at the bar was outstanding.

name: Matthew Lake
text: Great atmosphere and good service. We took family here visiting and they'd never been. Loved it.

name: GraceNote
text: Service was decent here, but I'm a little disappointed with the pizza.  It's not bad, just kinda...meh.  Pizza was dry and seemed to be lacking the flavor I expected.  Will choose another pizza place next time I'm in town.

name: Penelope Conlan
text: Great pizza place with some healthier alternatives.

name: Duncan
text: Consistently great pizza. High-quality ingredients, fresh and good value for the amount of food. Never been disappointed by the wait staff, managers check up to make sure you're having a good experience. Great outdoor seating area, well ‚Ä¶More

name: Lily Klein
text: Best. Mushroom. Soup. EVER! I'm visiting from Delaware & I kid you not, I've never had mushroom soup like this before! Also their pretzel bites??! AMAZEBALLS! Even their beer tasted fresh. Thank you for an awesome meal!!!!

name: Sean B
text: Good pizza and good service, however prefer Partners as the best pizza in PTC.

name: Robb Zbierski
text: Dropped in here with the intention of carrying out. Ended up eating in and glad I did! Bartender was super friendly and helpful. Food came out quickly and was awesome! Great beer selections and everyone genuinely seemed to enjoy working there. Definitely recommend!

name: Kelley Carter
text: The gluten free options are better than other pizzerias. Service is awesome...

name: Caitreona Albers
text: Food is always good here. Just needs work on the service. Our server was not very good.

name: Sandy Francis
text: Food is good but it's incredibly hot in this restaurant because it's really small and the kitchen is as big as the dining area.  Best is take out option!!!

name: David Soper
text: Pizza is not on the inexpensive side but in this life you get what you pay for and the pizza is great. Add good aps and a good beer selection. It's all good.  Half price beers on Mondays.

name: william Patrick
text: Tasty pizza. Great service.

name: Julia Treas
text: Best pizza ive ever had!

name: patrick hendricks
text: We always love going to Mellow Mushroom! Parmesian pretzels are the best! Our waiter was super nice, and the manager was extremely helpful when we had an issue with our gift card (apparently it had happened with several cards that day) and she honored it even though it didn't work. Very nice!

name: Rachel Harris
text: Picked up my pizza and couldn't wait to get home and eat.  So disappointed. ...crust was burned and ruined the taste. Usually love MM, but today was definitely a let-down.

name: Jackie Baze
text: We love the Holy Shitake and are thankful this location in PTC has brought back the loaded potato. We also always enjoy their beer selection, especially as compared to most other pizza parlors around.

name: Kara Sterling
text: It is a small Mellow Mushroom so may have a long wait if busy.  Very nice patio area though.  Our waitress was very good.  Pizza very full of toppings dough did need a bit more time to cook. Maybe tell them to keep it in the oven for a minute or two more.  Salad delicious.

name: Zenaida Ortiz
text: Fabulous food, fantastic service, and paid great attention to our dietary needs.  Will definitely go again!

name: Calvin F
text: This place has a great atmosphere that really accents the "mellow" experience. The food is generally superb, and provides a large variety. My only complaint is that they take a fair amount of time to prepare the food, but that's a small price to pay for high quality.

name: Crystal Jones
text: Good food and great employees.

name: Lynn Lund
text: Enjoyed our lunch very much and service was great as usual.

name: James Schneider

text: Good Food Served By Great People

name: Yadav Kulkarni
text: Nice place, good pizza variety, has few good vegetarian options as well. Usually crowded (you may need to wait to be seated). Overall, good experience.

name: Daniel Graddy
text: House Specialty pizza is my favorite. Greek Esperanza salad and spinach artichoke dip are excellent starters. Indoor and outdoor seating available with great friendly service. Good draft beer selection. Can accommodate families or couple's.

name: Deidra Burson
text: Great server!!!

text: This pizza is the best in town.

text: Food might have been good had we been waited on. We were told to have a good night as we left...

Pizza was delicious and the service was excellent.

name: Steven Lockwood

name: Sean Hulse

Great pizzas and calzones!

name: Jen Cloud
text: The gluten free pizza is the best! Great service & atmosphere. I'm honestly sad that I live thousands of miles away, I would love if this small local chain would go national!!
